Reviews.Content: stayed 17 people celebrating 50th birthday found monk catered diverse covered ages 14 70 covered supermarket market stalls cafes coffee shop corner visiting amsterdam 35 apartments largest accommodations seen amsterdam larger surrounding homes apartments access balcony bedroom apartment main attraction location lots atmosphere plenty handle stairs penthouse views space cocktail party 20 people bedroom door laugh hung upside larger door frame front overlooking street floor apartment ones access balcony mention whilst balconies spot chill surrounded residents quick complain noise 10pm reprimanded 3 times realise otherwise caused trouble 1030pm using foul language laughing lot threatened police summary monk casually managed complex equipped apartments location value deserves rating

Reviews.Content: definitely exceeded expectations travelled 3 stay hostel luck secured accomodation actually busy time congress happening alot accomodation booked week stayed 2 nights definitely worth convenience luxury described experience cant spot faults prestine clean living own veranda

Reviews.Title: “Great location, lovely owner, nice apartment.”
Reviews.Author: BetsyGolightly
Reviews.Content: stayed december 2010 boyfriend review little late apartments walking distance station walk red light district chinatown onto nieuwmarkt square square giant building called de actually restaurant dinner 21st birthday 2009 perfect entire building lit candles food die highly recommended 2010 tried book table due corporate events run christmas tiny restaurant heart red light district called de wal love food choice couple meals menu talk arrival reminded michelin star restaurants tv fillet hare divine arriving monk apartments little keys separate entrance hall steep stairs apartments booked 1 bedroom upgraded 2 bedroom spacious clean im fussy couldnt fault basic furniture little balcony overlooked apartments patios underneath apartments amsterdam buildings reviewer mentioned mice apartments stayed 2009 posher unfortunately private couple mice owner traps etc sometimes accept isnt lot due nature streets buildings amsterdam monk apartments apartment facilities including dishwasher comfy beds 2 separate duvets nice range cooker location perfect dont people scared red light district safe possibly safe quieter minus 10 day apartment lovely cosy id recommend

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT !”

Reviews.Content: apartment perfect apartment lot larger expected based pics found online overall apartment spacious service friendly apartment clean furnished comfortable beds nice shower cheaper hotel privacy hotel super

Reviews.Title: “Perfect - Could not ask for more”
Reviews.Author: Kev_Hunter
Reviews.Content: arrived monk apartments meet note door advising call arrived henk arrived 5 minutes calling 6 guys booked apartment sleep 6 meant guys sharing double bed henk noticed offered 2 bedroomed apartment upstairs completely free charge booked length stay amazing shortly set keys 10 mins walk central station apartments themselves modern clean maid arrived day empty bins fresh towels fantastic location redlight light district 50 yards wouldnt beautiful nieuwmarkt square 20 yards opposite direction truly doorstep hesitate return apartments highly recommend
